name: Goblins! VR
description:
A room-scale VR puzzle game with the simple goal of getting all of your hapless goblins from the castle gates to the portal exit...

...without getting them splattered on your (virtual) living room carpet.

Lead your line of goblins through various obstacles and traps with an array of special moves from jet-packs to climb to pneumatic drills to, well, drill...

[DEMO free to download]

Current features:

  • Casual puzzle VR game
  • All-voxel art style
  • Retro puzzle mechanics (you know which game...)
  • Room-scale VR
  • Compatible with HTC Vive and Oculus Rift
  • Prototype/beta build 
  • Multiple soundtracks to suit your mood while playing

Goblins! VR is currently at the prototype/pre-alpha stage. It is fully working and playable but currently limited to a small number of levels and the single theme of Fantasy World. The hope is that the community will enjoy this little demo and give feedback on how to best complete this project.

Thanks for trying this game.
